website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option with a couple design quirks, but overall, a decent choice for beginner or budget-conscious mountain bikers.
pros: Ergonomic design intended for long-distance mountain biking
Durable outer fork for improved stability
Available in three sizes and four styles
cons: Occasional oil leaks and missing pieces
Comes as a fork only, with no additional accessories or even a user manual

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny 😎
customer_reviews.text: I am a recreational MTBer. Great entry level shock at an affordable price. It will open your mind to buying better forks and taking that risk. I put it on my (29er) 2019 GT Avalanche hardtail and I love it. Remember to adjust it and set it up for you. These are not plug and play. Setup is easy and the chart is on the fork for weights and psi levels. I hope this brand develops more selection and variety in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Severo L.

customer_reviews.title: Great fork at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome upgrade replacement for my Suntour XCM30 fork. Very smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Magana

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: After month of use the fork snapped rendering my bike useless.
customer_reviews.author: Evan necochea

customer_reviews.title: Leaks oil, missing star nut and race.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed good at first, but didn’t come with a star nut(didn’t specify), didn’t come with a race(definitely should have specified that fact), the forks leak oil out of the box and after charged with air! It does look sharp and the rebound adjustment knob works good. Overall if it didn’t leak oil it would be an amazing value for the $$. Anyone else have the same issues I have experienced??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for down hill or free riding.
customer_reviews.text: Not truthfully advertized no where in the description does it say not for down hill or free riding ownly in one questions ask. I bought with no intention of using it for down hill or free riding but if I would have known that I would not have bought it. But it will serve its perpuse. Due to being diseptive only 2 stars and I feel that is generous.
customer_reviews.author: Fred F Stone

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product is expected perfect finish and color very good product I do not give the 5 stars since the brake cable holder arrived in addition to the delay in delivery
customer_reviews.author: bladimir rojas

customer_reviews.title: Hazardous. Danger. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This fork is dangerous!!! Do not buy. Looks great, but after 2 rides, it locks out on small bumps at random. Toggling the adjuster fixes it temporarily but cannot be relied on. One bump absorbs fine and the next has no travel. Unexpected function makes this a hazard on anything but smooth roads which defeats the purpose of a shock fork. Save your $$. I don’t normally write reviews but losing some skin and $$ makes me want to caution anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but only 120mm of travel
customer_reviews.text: Think it's a good entry form. I had a hard time finding a 26" fork because they're out of style in the mtb community. Unfortunately, I cut the stem too short (a rookie mistake) and will have to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bivins

customer_reviews.title: Appears well made.
customer_reviews.text: 10/13/2020 The forks came with all the necessary parts to make it function. It seems to be well made, and has a nice finish. Time will tell how it holds up, but I am optimistic. I bought this to install on my 2020 Schwinn Al Comp. I will update once it is installed, and I have used it for a while. For the price, I believe you would be hard pressed to find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen King

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been riding this for about month now on my local trail I'm no expert mtb rider but I been riding some of the local trail for 8 years now and feel this forks is as good as any of my pass forks for all the major brans such as Rockshox, suntour and Foxx I find this fork to be very lite and responsive and doable so far and for price I think you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a steel spring fork to this air fork. This fork weighs half of what the original fork did. For the money it cannot be beat. I ride trails and do some jumping. It has not bottomed out or sounded clunky at all. I'm almost 200lbs so the fork does get a work out. Definite buy for anyone looking to upgrade box store fork.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Smolen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for a lower end bike spring fork! I installed on a 2015 diamondback overdrive 29er, and the difference is amazing. I went for the tapered for extra stiffness, and had to purchase a headset to convert, but could have went for the strait and simply installed. There can be some stickiness in the shock action, but not as much under a load. Good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great suspension fork for the money. Put this fork on my XR-Pro. Light trail ride and XC super light weight. shed almost 5 lbs off my bike. Much better than my stock pogo stick fork. I don’t think I would recommend it for serious downhill but for my use as a xc trainer bike its a perfect fit. One thing that I feel could use some improvement is in the seals. Shock holds air in the ride but when it sits for a week I need to pump it up again. Also note some oil on the posts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert b.

customer_reviews.title: Another crap product from China
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. All the flash but doesn’t perform. Rebound adjustment is a joke. Stanchion movement feels like sandpaper going down a rusted steel pipe. After 2 rides the fork is gritty. Don’t purchase because you’ll end up wasting a star nut.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice suspension but it came without air.
customer_reviews.text: The fork is nice I really like it but it came without air in it and it could have got a scratch on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Leaks oil. I doubt it lasts long. Still glad I bought it. Way better than the suntour forks that came with the bike.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: great price, great fork, boom!!! sold!!!
customer_reviews.text: a pretty good fork for the price and also arrive early then i expected, been riding it hard pretty sturdy, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ralphyboii

customer_reviews.title: Not confidence inspiring, pours seals which will shorten life span.
customer_reviews.text: The shock stanchions seals don’t even touch so dirt can go straight in causing excessive wear on the forks. Has lots of back and forth play. Rides okay but does inspire confidence due to the excessive play. You can feel and hear this fork on the trail moving around in its slop. Doesn’t come with star nut.
customer_reviews.author: Nakiah

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Makes my bike rides a lot smoother. Just wish it had extender for the disk breaks
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great street fork!
customer_reviews.text: Great budget fork and build! I use for pretty rough street riding. Overall great and comes pre-pumped up. Only problem was that it is a little hard to get the race on but a little grease should help.
customer_reviews.author: snowballAsao

customer_reviews.title: MTB air forks
customer_reviews.text: The price is incredible and it's just what I needed as an upgrade. Would recommend for the weekend mtb rider, that is entry mid level.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: lite
customer_reviews.text: a lot stiction. seem to work ok. I dont know how durable and the stations seem a bit weak for any rough riding. I bought it to shed weight on a custom ebike and to provide a soft ride on the street.
customer_reviews.author: Henry M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price but great product...
customer_reviews.text: This fork has an adjustble suspension. A less expensive product but does a great work. It looks good and the quality built is in the midrange.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth

customer_reviews.title: I NEED A REFUND
customer_reviews.text: i was scammed because i though the steering tube is long enough for my bike but it was too short that i had to buy a steer tube extender!!! pleaae at least refund me half of my money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Michael Catellier

customer_reviews.title: Needs headset
customer_reviews.text: Nice compression needs Star nut and bearing race. Bought a headset kit to put it back together :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimo_577

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Lockout broke within 2 weeks. Air seals leaked. Not sure how this company is in business
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I wasnt expecting much but pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Great fork and at this price it's a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BOLANY 26/27.5/29 inch MTB Bicycle Magnesium Alloy Suspension Fork, Tapered Steerer and Straight Steerer Front Fork (Manual Lockout - Remote Lockout)
product_meta.description:
MTB Suspension Air Fork 
Brand: BOLANY
Fit For:Tapered Tube and Straight Tube Mountain Bike
Axle :9 mm *100 mm 
Travel :100 mm，
Brake type： disk brakes

Features：Air suspension ；Lockout 
Material : Crown（Forged alloy processing Lower ）；Leg（Magnesium alloy）
Weight：about 26‘’1650g；27.5‘’1680g；29‘’1710g

Options：
Size :(1)26''(2)27.5''(3)29''
Lockout:(1)Remote;(2)manual

Purchase with confidence:Professional industry R&D team and more than 20 years of professional and technical personnel are our guarantee for providing quality products and high-end services! At present, our products are not only sold well in China, but also exported to many countries and have been recognized by everyone.The integrity and strength of Dongguan Kailun Bicycle Co., Ltd. have also been recognized by the industry.
feature_bullets: Specifications: 26 / 27.5 / 29 inch optional,Including Tapered Steerer and Straight Steerer Two styles, Crown manual Lockout and Remote Lockout two Lockout devices. Travel:100mm。Axle :9 mm *100 mm，Brake type： disk brakes
Material: Mountain bike suspension fork, Made of high quality Aluminum alloy+Magnesium alloy, strong and durable, Stable control of your bike, Play a protective role in your Outdoor cycling

Highlights:Can be quickly disassembled and assembled,Oil and gas structure process. According to the rider's weight and riding condition,adjust the comfortable air pressure value to achieve better experience effect

Advantage: The outer tube of the fork tube is more stable and stronger, effectively preventing the circulation of the traveling tube from being polluted by dust.Surface polishing plus hard fat oxidation, wear resistance, lubrication, low resistance, smooth rebound.

Professional Design: Exquisite workmanship, beautifully painted and has a bright appearance, numerical controlled precision bending. Shockproof and durable. Ergonomic design provides good condition in the long-distance cycling
